attributes.action: stop Pubco's selling off Local Pubs with restrictive covenants preventing continued use as a pub to restrict competition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As more and more of our "locals" die, Pub Companies in particular are selling off these properies Freehold. Unable to find tenants willing to pay thousands for a Tied Lease, they are selling these community jewels off Freehold with covenants preventing any further use as a pub. 

This is purely in order to preserve their own market share and disable competition in the Free of Tie sector.
It is anti-competitive and morally wrong!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
